Do military posturing or military exercise

content: To the nations of the world, I suggest that we keep up with pursuing our respective interests while keeping tensions to a minimum. Economic development and diplomatic ties will help us maintain global stability.
If all sides do not withdraw troops and adopt aggressive military postures, they will not be able to realize the threat posed by global nuclear warfare.
To ensure stability and security in the world we should cooperate.
